    Class BaseDatabaseRetryDecorator

    Provides a base class for implementing retry logic for database operations.

    protected BaseDatabaseRetryDecorator(ILogger logger, int retryCount = 3)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    ILogger logger

    The logger for capturing retry attempts.
    int retryCount

    The number of retry attempts (default is 3).
